# AddressSanitizer suppressions for JAPAN-MOLLER Analysis Framework
# This file contains suppressions for known false positives from external libraries
# Usage: Set ASAN_OPTIONS=suppressions=.github/asan-suppressions.txt

# ROOT Framework suppressions
# ROOT has many internal memory management patterns that trigger false positives
leak:libCore.so
leak:libTree.so
leak:libHist.so
leak:libRIO.so
leak:libNet.so
leak:libThread.so
leak:libMathCore.so
leak:libMatrix.so
leak:libGui.so

# ROOT's TClass and TROOT singletons are never cleaned up
leak:TClass::
leak:TROOT::
leak:TApplication::
leak:TSystem::

# ROOT's interpreter (Cling) allocations
leak:cling::
leak:clang::
leak:llvm::

# Boost library suppressions
# Boost has some static allocations that are reported as leaks
leak:boost::

# EVIO library suppressions
# EVIO uses custom memory management
leak:evio::
leak:evRead
leak:evWrite

# System library suppressions
# glibc allocations that are not actual leaks
leak:libc.so
leak:libpthread.so
leak:libstdc++.so
leak:libgcc_s.so

# X11/GUI related suppressions (for panguin)
leak:libX11.so
leak:libXt.so
leak:libXm.so
leak:libGL.so

# Suppress one-time initializations in static constructors
leak:__static_initialization_and_destruction

# Suppress TLS (Thread Local Storage) allocations
leak:__tls_get_addr

# MySQL++ library suppressions (if enabled)
leak:libmysqlpp.so
leak:libmysqlclient.so
